onboardingDesc1: Select the photo you want to remove the background from
onboardingDesc2: Wait a few seconds for your photo to be perfect!
onboardingDesc3: Your amazing photo with the background removed is ready to download!
loadingText: Our wizard is working to make your photo the best it can be.
errorText1: Some things didn't go as expected.
